items.sentence: Tom could tell that it would be impossible to reach a compromise with Mary.
Tom wasn\'t wearing a shirt, so they wouldn\'t let him into the restaurant.
Tom couldn\'t understand why his company\'s products weren\'t selling well.
Tom forgot the words to the second verse, so he sang the first verse again.
I shouldn\'t have wasted my time trying to convince Tom to change his mind.
Tom wants to ask what Mary has been doing, but he knows that he shouldn\'t.
The reason Tom isn\'t here is because he had to go to Boston for a funeral.
Tom can\'t go to the beach this weekend with you because he has a bad cold.
Tom doesn\'t know what became of Mary after she graduated from high school.
Tom didn\'t want to disturb Mary so late at night, but it was an emergency.
